item.title: Personal website using Hugo & GitHub Pages
item.description: 01 Why Hugo & GitHub Pages I used Hugo simply because the template of Hugo is prettier compared to that of Jekyll. GitHub pages is a great option for hosting static websites because it’s free and easy to use. 02 Pre-build It is suggested to watch the playlist before you start using the Hugo template: Hugo - Static Site Generator | Tutorial Though the playlist is a bit old, most of the steps are still applicable, especially for roughly understanding the Hugo framework.

item.title: Syntax Page
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
